channel.title: Posts on Tom Hickerson's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tom Hickerson's Site

item.title: Working with Github Pages
item.description: I’m starting to work on this blog again to get away from the WordPress way of working with things, that is, to have someone else set up the MySQL and PHP and hope it’s all the right version and away we go. Working with Github Pages has helped me understand Git a little more, like using things like git rm and git submodule.
item.content: I’m starting to work on this blog again to get away from the WordPress way of working with things, that is, to have someone else set up the MySQL and PHP and hope it’s all the right version and away we go. Working with Github Pages has helped me understand Git a little more, like using things like git rm and git submodule.

item.title: First Post
item.description: First post, let’s see where this goes.
item.content: First post, let’s see where this goes.
